column1: ID System: Past Due 90+ Days 1-4 Family Residential

column4: The number of institutions represented in that column of data.  This number is used primarily for peer group data.

column2: Secured By 1-4 Family Residential Properties, Past Due 90+ Days
column4: Total loans secured by 1-4 family residential properties past due 90 or more days and still accruing interest which are held in domestic offices of the institution.

column2: Past Due 90+ Days Secured  By 1-4 Family First Liens
column4: Closed-end loans secured by first liens on 1-4 family residential properties that are held in domestic office and are 90 days or more past due and still accruing interest.

column2: Past Due 90+ Days Secured  By 1-4 Family Junior Liens
column4: Closed-end loans secured by junior liens on 1-4 family residential properties that are held in domestic office and are 90 days or more past due and still accruing interest.

column2: Home Equity Lines of Credit, Past Due 90+ Days
column4: Total revolving, open-end loans secured by 1-4 family residential properties and extended under lines of credit past due 90 or more days and still accruing interest which are held in domestic offices of the institution.
